amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the National Endowment for the Arts by $15 million and apply $4.8 million to the payments in lieu of taxes account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding to implement the Act of October 20, 2976, as amended (31 U.S.C. 6901-6907) by $4,800,000 and to reduce funding to the National Endowment for the Arts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 311 (Roll no. 191).
